meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring on the receiving side of a synapse.
meanings.sent1: The postsynaptic neuron receives signals from the presynaptic neuron.
meanings.sent2: The postsynaptic cell responds to neurotransmitters.
meanings.sent3: The postsynaptic party was always the last to know the gossip.
meanings.sent4: Her postsynaptic awareness allowed her to understand subtle social cues.
meanings.sent5: The postsynaptic connection was crucial for the message to be received.

meanings.definition: In a manner that pertains to the area after a synapse.
meanings.sent1: The signal traveled postsynaptically to reach the next neuron.
meanings.sent2: Information is processed postsynaptically after crossing the synapse.
meanings.sent3: He always arrived postsynaptically late to the meetings.
meanings.sent4: The idea spread postsynaptically throughout the brain.
meanings.sent5: The message was relayed postsynaptically, ensuring accurate communication.

meanings.definition: In a way that is connected to the region following a synapse.
meanings.sent1: The neurotransmitter binds postsynaptically to receptors.
meanings.sent2: The electrical signal is transmitted postsynaptically.
meanings.sent3: She thought postsynaptically about the conversation after it ended.
meanings.sent4: The information flowed postsynaptically, linking one neuron to another.
meanings.sent5: The synapse functioned postsynaptically, ensuring proper communication.
